meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

vlive.korean: 플렉스 해버렸지 뭐야? He did flex! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 핫하다 못해 뜨거운 우리 대표님을 소개합니다 [가두리횟집] VLOG 02
[동묘를 FLEX 해버렸지 뭐야~] 거의 약간 동묘 그 자체인데? 고른 것들이? [FLEX in Dongmyo flea market] It's like he bought them from Dongmyo. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.104
vlive.english: [FLEX in Dongmyo flea market] It's like he bought them from Dongmyo.

vlive.korean: 피부과에서 플렉스 해버렸지 뭐야~ I flexed at the dermatologist. 듣기 View video VICTON : 쉬는시간😁
네가 여기 플라스틱 버렸지? You're the one who threw the plastic away here, aren't you? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 네 옆에는 늘 내가 있을래 [연애미수] EP10
vlive.english: You're the one who threw the plastic away here, aren't you?

vlive.korean: 네가 여기 우유팩 버렸지? You're the one that threw away the milk carton here, aren't you? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 네 옆에는 늘 내가 있을래 [연애미수] EP10
vlive.english: You're the one that threw away the milk carton here, aren't you?

examples.korean: Terribly, the nation has become an idiocracy. 발음듣기 끔찍하게도 나라는 바보 정부 국가가 되어버렸지. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Terribly, the nation has become an idiocracy. 발음

examples.korean: How did this dangerous state of affairs come about? 발음듣기 어쩌다가 일이 이토록 위험한 지경이 되어 버렸지? Neungyule
examples.english: How did this dangerous state of affairs come about? 발음

examples.korean: What should happen but my elevator stopped halfway. 발음듣기 내가 탄 승강기가 웬걸 중간에서 서 버렸지 않은가. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What should happen but my elevator stopped halfway. 발음

examples.korean: After eating it, I fell asleep under this tree. 발음듣기 그걸 먹고는 이 나무 아래에서 잠이 들어 버렸지 뭐야. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After eating it, I fell asleep under this tree. 발음

examples.korean: Oh, you are right. How could I forget that? 발음듣기 아, 맞습니다. 내가 어쩌다 그것을 잊어버렸지? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Oh, you are right. How could I forget that? 발음
